The claim was verified by comparing the: such as articles and social media posts, that falsely used the same images to make different claims. This comparison helped to establish the true context and location of the photos.
The expert: s verdict also mentioned that the photos were originally posted on Jamiiforums.com, a Tanzanian message board site, in a post that specifically described them as showing an electricity project. The fact that the photos were shared on a local platform and associated with an electricity project added credibility to the claim.
The Tanzanian energy ministry: s website contained a statement that confirmed the purpose of Minister Kalemani's visit to the Kigoma region and the launch of an electricity distribution project. This official statement further supported the authenticity of the claim.
